document.full_text: there's a big disconnect between what upper-income people think about the fairness of their own tax burden, and about the tax burden of "upper-income people" -- because so many rich people don't realize they're talking about themselves.
document.title: rich people don't realize they're rich
lines_and_colors: there's a big disconnect between what upper-income people think about the fairness of their own tax burden, and about the tax burden of "upper-income people" -- because so many rich people don't realize they're talking about themselves.
